mission.headline: Bridging the digital divide isn't charity.
mission.paragraph1: 3.7 billion people lack reliable internet access. Traditional approaches fail because they assume connectivity.
mission.paragraph2: We built a complete technology stack that works offline-first, solar-powered, and locally owned. Geography should not determine destiny.
